function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Regional integration of electronic health records of suspected COVID-19 individuals as they travel from one country to the other","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 and lack of coordinated response across regions","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy and security measures, and ensure accurate transmission of health records","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, secure data transfer protocols","People":"Suspected COVID-19 individuals, healthcare workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Health authorities, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Tracking of home-quarantined individuals using GPS and mobile phones","Impact":"Privacy concerns, potential misuse of personal data, and lack of effective monitoring","Mitigation":"Obtain consent for tracking, anonymize data, and use secure data storage and transmission","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, secure data storage, and encryption","People":"Home-quarantined individuals, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, technology providers"},{"Description":"Malicious attack of IoMT healthcare equipment","Impact":"Compromised patient care, potential spread of infection, and disruption of healthcare services","Mitigation":"Implement robust cybersecurity measures, conduct regular security audits, and train staff on cybersecurity best practices","Technologies":"Intrusion detection systems, encryption, cybersecurity training","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, medical device manufacturers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, medical device manufacturers"}]}
